price: ߝߙߊߥߎ߲߫ ߞߊ߲߫ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߛߎߓߊ߯ ߟߐ߲ߞߏߕߌ߮ ߓߍ߯ ߡߊߟߐ߬ ߒ ߠߊ߫ ߘߍ߫
arabic: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِكُلِّ سَٰحِرٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waqāla fir'ʿawnu i'tūnī bikulli sāḥirin ʿalīmin
